attributes.action: Call to End Interest on Student Loans
attributes.additional_details: Permanent adoption of interest-free student finance, ensuring that no borrower repays more than they borrowed in real terms. Education should empower, not burden. By removing interest from student loans, we can restore fairness, reduce long-term debt anxiety, and reaffirm our commitment to accessible higher education for all.
attributes.background: Immediate implementation of a 0% interest rate on all student loans, regardless of plan type.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705923
